question: Which country is to host a virtual SAARC meet to discuss on management and response of Covid-19?
explanation:
India is set to host a virtual South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) meet to discuss on management and response of Covid-19 pandemic.
This health secretary-level meet virtually with other SAARC countries, will be conducted as a virtual workshop to exchange best practices amid the pandemic. In 2014, Nepal hosted a SAARC leaders' summit, which was the most recent meeting of the countries.
